授業目的:
The main objective is to improve the students’ ability to discuss issues in English.
The secondary objective is to improve their active vocabulary.
到達目標:
By the end of the course, students will be able to:

1. Improve speaking and listening skills more through group discussions, presentations, and debate.
2. Become more familiar with personal and social issues in society.
3. Gain more confidence to express their opinion related to these topics.
4. Develop more critical thinking skills.
5. Develop more skills for academic writing.
授業方法:

トピック.授業計画1:
Classes will have the instructor introduce the topic, an activity to help students prepare for the situation described in the book, reading comprehension, facilitating of student opinions and help with students in talking about the topic. The class will conclude with students being able to share their own ideas. As the course continues and depending on student development, the class may be more student-centered than teacher-centered later on in the course.

The instructor will be a facilitator of various tasks to help students communicate with each other in English. There will be ample opportunity for pair work.

Students it is best if you have a laptop computer and a portable device available simultaneously.
トピック.授業外学習2: Students are required to prepare for class and when appropriate review. Students are required to bring their textbook, a pen or pencil, paper, and a dictionary to class. Students, please prepare for the online learning environment if necessary. Students please be prepared for all circumstances. Yes, we have homework. Students will need to do some tasks between classes via homework items in the schedule. Mr. Lin will explain how homework is to be submitted in class.
